title: 求助，mod服一开就自动关闭
author: woshiadgjl
txt_content:
一下为崩溃是的内容
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: port out of range:68741
        at java.net.InetSocketAddress.checkPort(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_201]
        at java.net.InetSocketAddress.<init>
(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_201]
        at io.netty.bootstrap.AbstractBootstrap.localAddress(AbstractBootstrap.java:149) ~[AbstractBootstrap.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkSystem.func_151265_a(NetworkSystem.java:120) ~[md.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedS
erver.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:185) ~[ld.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:431) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_201]
[14:43:35] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash repo
rt has been saved to: F:\****\1.10.2mod\.\crash-reports\crash-2019-03-03_14.43.35-server.txt

注：服务端为Sponge端

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 端口超出范围，请设置其他数字

replies.author: woshiadgjl
replies.txt_content:
youyoudeminger 发表于 2019-3-3 14:49
F:\****\1.10.2mod\.\crash-reports\crash-2019-03-03_14.43.35-server.txt这个文件发一下
就是这个文件
话说还要十个字以上才行







crash-2019-03-03_14.43.35-server.txt


2019-3-3 14:56 上传

replies.author: enson
replies.txt_content: 服务器参数文件：server.properties　如下内容server-port=68741　<--数字设置小些，超出范围了
